actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to assure coverage for legal immigrant children and pregnant women under the Medicaid Program and the State children's health insurance program (SCHIP).
short_title: Legal Immigrant Health Restoration Act of 2003
subjects: Federal aid to child health services

summary.text: Legal Immigrant Health Restoration Act of 2003 - Amends titles XIX (Medicaid) and XXI (State Children's Health Insurance) (SCHIP) of the Social Security Act to ensure coverage for eligible permanent resident pregnant women and children under the Medicaid and SCHIP programs.

titles.title: Legal Immigrant Health Restoration Act of 2003
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to assure coverage for legal immigrant children and pregnant women under the Medicaid Program and the State children's health insurance program (SCHIP).
